member.name: T:Sudoku.Bot.ConfigurationPaths
member.summary: Provides with the paths that are defined in the local JSON configuration file.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Bot.ConfigurationPaths.LastTimeCheckedIn
member.summary: Indicates the path lastTimeCheckedIn. This field is used for checking whether the user clocks in in a same day.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Bot.ConfigurationPaths.ExperiencePoint
member.summary: Indicates the path experiencePoint. This field records the value measuring the user's interaction frequency. The greater the value be, the more times the user interacts with the bot.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Bot.JsonConverters.DictionaryConverter
member.summary: Defines a dictionary JSON converter that can convert a list of key value pairs into a JSON string.

member.summary: Provides with extension methods on of and .

member.summary: Try to get all property values via the specified names.
member.param: The property names you want to check and get corresponding values.
member.returns: The pair of values indicating the found values.

member.name: M:System.Text.Json.JsonElementExtensions.ToDictionaryOfStringElements(System.Text.Json.JsonElement)
member.returns: The instance. The keys and values in this dictionary are all instances.

member.summary: Adds a new converter of type into the current instance.
member.typeparam: The type of the JSON converter.

member.name: T:Program
member.summary: Indicates the entry point of the program.

member.name: M:Program.OnSuccessfullyConnected
member.summary: Indicates callback method that will be invoked when the bot has successfully connected to the server, and successfully passed the authorization.

member.name: M:Program.OnFailedConnected
member.summary: Indicates callback method that will be invoked when the bot has failed connected to the server, or failed passed the authorization.
